sub_fields.label: Size
sub_fields.name: size
sub_fields.instructions: Select Size

sub_fields.label: video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: link to video eg: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Boundless/assets/mymovie.webm

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button
sub_fields.instructions: If filled out will create a red button area under the title.

sub_fields.label: Bread Crumbs
sub_fields.name: bread_crumbs
sub_fields.instructions: Add Breadcrumbs? Automatically on of Destination and Activity Pages.

sub_fields.label: Left-align the copy?
sub_fields.name: left_align_copy
sub_fields.instructions: Check this if you have more than one paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Quote Title
sub_fields.name: quote_title
sub_fields.instructions: Will Override Guide Checkbox and Location for Headline

sub_fields.label: Location for Headline
sub_fields.name: location_for_headline
sub_fields.instructions: If entered will use whatever is written here instead of "Us" for the title of the quote.

sub_fields.label: Is author a guide?
sub_fields.name: is_a_guide
sub_fields.instructions: Checking this will change Guests to Guides in the Title. Changing the quote title overrides this.

sub_fields.label: Image Height Override
sub_fields.name: image_height_override
sub_fields.instructions: Default is 165. Just enter the numerical value, no "px".

sub_fields.label: Common
sub_fields.name: common
sub_fields.instructions: Select An Common Content Post to use for this display.

sub_fields.label: Internal Link
sub_fields.name: internal_link
sub_fields.instructions: This link type links to a page within this website.

sub_fields.label: External Link
sub_fields.name: external_link
sub_fields.instructions: This link type links to a page on another website and opens in a new tab/window.

sub_fields.label: Video Link
sub_fields.name: video_link
sub_fields.instructions: This link type opens a video from YouTube into an overlay. Just input the 11-digit YouTube ID.

sub_fields.label: Email Link
sub_fields.name: email_link
sub_fields.instructions: This link type sends an email to the specified address. Please just input the email address.

sub_fields.label: Headline as Link
sub_fields.name: headline_as_link
sub_fields.instructions: Will make the headline a link.

sub_fields.label: Related Categories
sub_fields.name: related_categories
sub_fields.instructions: Leave Blank to default to current page if destination or country.

sub_fields.label: Related Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add the title to the listed articles.
sub_fields.placeholder: Articles Related to Our European Journeys

sub_fields.label: Ignore Menu
sub_fields.name: ignore_menu
sub_fields.instructions: Hide menu.

sub_fields.label: Full Tour Search
sub_fields.name: full_tour_search
sub_fields.instructions: Displays Search filter and pagination.

sub_fields.label: Display Count
sub_fields.name: display_count
sub_fields.instructions: Enter how many items to show

sub_fields.label: Split Content Image
sub_fields.name: split_content_image
sub_fields.instructions: Ideal image size is 850x766.

sub_fields.label: Country Location
sub_fields.name: country_location
sub_fields.instructions: Select the country on the map.

sub_fields.label: Related Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add the title to the listed trips.
